eu_initiatives: GCA has as one of its founders the City of London Police Department. GCA is working with numerous governmental entities in the UK with the implementation of DMARC. This protocol prevents an organization's email from being spoofed. GCA is signing an MOU with Europol to share both its DNS and DMARC solutions with member nations.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: GCA is a cross sector  international not for profit that focuses on systemic cyber risks. GCA's mission is to identify the  systemic cyber risk identifies solutions and then measure the effectiveness of solutions and sharing those solutions.
relevant_communication: GCA has been assisting in the circulation of the EU CERT's white paper on the importance of the implementation of DMARC. GCA has met with the technical/operational staff at Europol to discuss working together on DMARC, DNS and the No More Ransom work group that was started by the Dutch National Police and is being supported and staffed by Europol.
legal_status: not for profit incorporated in Belgium,UK, USA
